description: '''Bahram Meshadi Suleyman oglu Mansurov''' ({{langx|az|Bəhram Məşədi Süleyman bəy oğlu Mansurov}} / {{lang|az-Cyrl|Бәһрам Мәшәди Сүлејман бәј оғлу Мансуров}}, {{IPA|az|bæhˈɾɑm mæʃæˈdi sylejˈmɑn bæj oɣˈlu mɑnˈsuɾof|IPA}}; 12 February 1911, Baku – 14 May 1985, Baku) was a [[Soviet Union|Soviet]] and [[Azerbaijani people|Azerbaijani]] [[Tar (lute)]] player. He also served as  [[People's Artist]] of the [[Azerbaijan Soviet Socialist Republic|Azerbaijan SSR]] (10.01.1978).
